name: General Culinary 12 Quiz | Food & Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: What kind of meat is Copra?
Toddy is an alcoholic liquor made from which plant?
Ugaq is a delicacy in Greenland. What type of fish is it?
In China, junk is normally sold on the streets for rapid consumption. Literally, the name- or rubric , which they are classified translates to 'small foods'. What is the term used?
Which food from China, translates into Oyster-omelettes?
What did Napolean eat for dinner after the battle in 1800? Also, a famous dish is named after this event?
questions.explanation:
chicken.

	Chicken Marengo was prepared for Napolean after the Battle of Marengo.

questions.text: Which fruit from Peru means 'cold seeds'?
Which type of meal is made with bread soaked in fat or dripping?
Unleavened Indian breads are bland-ly delicious. Which of the following does not meet this quality?
What is the largest type of sucker-fish commonly made into a delicious soup, around the Great Plains area?
